remarks: Matrix multiplication is associative, see also statement in [Lang] p. 505.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)
statement:
mamucl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
mamucl.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
mamuass.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. Fin ) $.
mamuass.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) $.
mamuass.o $e |- ( ph -> O e. Fin ) $.
mamuass.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. Fin ) $.
mamuass.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( B ^m ( M X. N ) ) ) $.
mamuass.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( B ^m ( N X. O ) ) ) $.
mamuass.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. ( B ^m ( O X. P ) ) ) $.
mamuass.f $e |- F = ( R maMul <. M , N , O >. ) $.
mamuass.g $e |- G = ( R maMul <. M , O , P >. ) $.
mamuass.h $e |- H = ( R maMul <. M , N , P >. ) $.
mamuass.i $e |- I = ( R maMul <. N , O , P >. ) $.
mamuass $p |- ( ph -> ( ( X F Y ) G Z ) = ( X H ( Y I Z ) ) ) $.
